import React from 'react' // import 'font-awesome/css/font-awesome.min.css'; import { filter } from '../redux/actions/searchActions'; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import './Filters.css' const Filters = () => { const search = useSelector((state) => state.search); const { products } = search const dispatch = useDispatch(); return (
Filter by âž¤
dispatch(filter(products, 'lowerPrice'))}> Lower Price
dispatch(filter(products, 'higherPrice'))}> Higher Price
dispatch(filter(products, 'ascName'))}> Ascending Name
dispatch(filter(products, 'descName'))}> Descending Name
dispatch(filter(products, 'new'))}> New
dispatch(filter(products, 'used'))}> Used
) } export default Filters
